title: Biden's China strategy begins to be come clear, Republicans caught in GOP culture war
description: Chuck recaps his exclusive interview with Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson (R). Carrie Dann’s Number of the Week looks at the gap between people who identify as Republicans and those who identify as Democrats.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
